texts.biography: Not many wish to get into Corkes' enemy list.  This quick-tempered pirate is one of the most experienced and cruel sea dogs. Many merchants know that it is better to submit the goods willingly than to start a suicidal battle with him.  He is easily distinguishable by the eye patch that he never takes off.
